title: EditorConfig Init Generator Schema
description: Schema for the init generator that creates a .editorconfig file in the workspace root

name.description: The name of the generator or project context (used in templates)
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

directory.description: Optional subdirectory inside the workspace where the .editorconfig will be generated
directory.x-prompt: Do you want to generate the .editorconfig in a subdirectory? Leave empty for root
